Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone! I was so excited to hear that KSP was out of Beta that I just had to start playing again after several months off! This go round I decided to record and upload my adventures to my already established youtube channel! This thread will be updated from time to time with new episodes, but if you really want to stay up to date, subscribe and don't hesitate to offer advice, commiseration or encouragement! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

So far, I am no pro astronaut. If you are looking for the craaaziest launches and most efficient orbits I am not your man. HOWEVER! If you would like to learn and grow with me (not to mention laugh at my foolish mistakes) this is definitely for you!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9YB8Rb-6NbM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
